# Indices

**Associated Type**

A type that represents the indices that are valid for subscripting the collection, in ascending order.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Indices : Collection = DefaultIndices<Self> where Self.Indices == Self.Indices.SubSequence
```
title: Indices
